column1: # When filling in the INFO column, we will default to

column4: Variant suspect reason code (0 - unspecified, 1 - paralog, 2 - byEST, 3 - Para_EST, 4 - oldAlign, 5 - other)
Variant allele origin (0 - unspecified, 1 - germmline, 2 - somatic, 3 - both)
Weight (00 - unmapped, 1 - weight 1, 2 - weight 2, 3 - weight 3 or more)
Is Assembly specific. This is set if the variant only maps to one assembly

column1: ## These could be generated from code so user doesn't have to define these

column4: BioR required field - rsId (from ID field)
BioR required field - type of object (variant, gene, drug, etc)
BioR required field - chromosome (from CHROM field)
BioR required field - reference allele (from REF field)
BioR required field - alternate alleles (from ALT field) - JSON array
BioR required field - minimum base-pair (1-based) (from POS field)
BioR required field - maximum base-pair (1-based) (POS + length(REF))
